text: Asɨ 2.47 HJL 2.41, 4.33, 5.14, 6.7, 11.21, 11.24, Lom 14.18 dɨ ibi mɨŋaiahaiaha hɨniavɨhadami. Hameŋ lɨhavɨdaci hulaŋ iamɨgali limu hɨhɨle agɨlaŋ nulɨsaŋ hɨjɨŋalavɨhadami. Hɨjɨŋalavɨdaci nulɨdɨ Hekɨlɨ agaŋ uaiaŋ pabiŋ pabiŋ hɨvɨ hulaŋ iamɨgali limu hɨhɨle agɨladɨ ahɨliahudaci huaci hameŋ laci hameŋ laci hɨniavɨhadami. Hɨnihɨni hulaŋ iamɨgali Jisasɨ saŋ hɨji vɨdɨvɨdɨŋ lamavɨhadami agɨlaŋ hula mɨgudɨbavɨhadami. Mɨgudɨba hulaŋ iamɨgali akape hɨniavɨhadami.
